DOC.brief_summary: To determine which subclass of IgG in the serum of patients undergoing SIT against wasp venom is able to neutralize the allergen, and therefore to prevent a positive CAST
DOC.brief_title: Performance of CAST (Cellular Antigen Stimulation Test) in Patients With Wasp Venom Allergy: Evaluation of Neutralizing IgG Subclasses
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: male and female patient with allergy to wasp venom grade III and IV according to H.L. MÃ¼ller 1875 years planned SIT against wasp venom or finished 5 years SIT against wsp venom (10/10) Exclusion criteria: oral corticosteroids chromogycin ketotifen immunosuppressive drugs within the last 2 years
